original_definition: 'non-woody biomass' means biomass other than woody biomass, including straw, miscanthus, reeds, kernels, grains, olive stones, olive cakes and nut shells;
generated_definition: 'non-woody biomass' means non-woody biomass refers to any fuel or blend of biomass and fossil fuel, other than woody biomass, that is described in table 1 and meets the technical standards or specifications, including measured moisture, ash, and volatile content, as referred to in the sentences provided.

Article 9: where the preferred fuel or any other suitable fuel is other woody biomass, non-woody biomass, other fossil fuel or other blend of biomass and fossil fuel as referred to in Table 1, a description of the fuel sufficient for its unambiguous identification and the technical standard or specification of the fuel, including the measured moisture content, and the measured ash content, and for other fossil fuel also the measured volatile content of the fuel;
